oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photomontage of the Junior Riding Club at Woodland Trails in Nashville. Young girls riding horses are pictured. 16 x 21.5 in. Forms part of the Nashville Newspaper Rotogravure Digital Images Collection.
